starvationevasion.client.MegaMawile.ai.brain

Class EasyAi

  • java.lang.Object
    • starvationevasion.client.MegaMawile.ai.brain.BasicBrain
      • starvationevasion.client.MegaMawile.ai.brain.EasyAi
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Ai

    public class EasyAi
extends BasicBrain
implements Ai
    An easy AI

    This AI's behavior is relatively predictable - it makes decisions based on political/social "states" which will change as a result of the impacts of past decisions. There is some degree of stochasticity in its decision-making process (mostly as to whether it decides based on its political leaning or its social leaning).

    • Constructor Detail

      • EasyAi

        public EasyAi(ComputerPlayerController controller)
        Creates an easy AI player which can make moves through the passed ComputerPlayerController. The AI player's political/social leanings are randomly assigned, meaning that its behavior will be pseudo-random for each game.
        Parameters:
        controller - a ComputerPlayerController to use to make moves.

    • Method Detail

      • draftUpdate

        public void draftUpdate(float deltaSeconds)
        Updates the AI brain as appropriate for the drafting phase.

        Note: it is important that this is only called during the drafting phase by the ComputerPlayerController and not otherwise. The update methods rely heavily on several boolean flags which are shared between update methods.

        Specified by:
        draftUpdate in interface Ai
        Parameters:
        deltaSeconds - deltaSeconds from the GameEngine.
